checkin.message: OK! We've got you @ 4SQ HQ - Soho. This is your 8th checkin here!

mayor.message: You're still The Mayor of 4SQ HQ - Soho! (11 checkins in the past 2 months)

specials.special: If you're the mayor, show the bartender and your first drink is free! (just beer and well drinks guys, let's be fair)
